markdown:
| icon              = poe2 mace_icon.png
| description       = The bane of mailed soldiers throughout the known world, maces are a common sight in the Dyrwood. Regardless of the shape of their flanges, maces always consist of a metal shaft topped with a number of symmetrical flanges that focus the weapon's power to a small point. Though estocs have even more penetrating power than maces, the latter can be used in concert with a shield.

| equipment_slot    = Weapon
